nodes.text: Coratanni Town, formerly known as Ruugaria, was a town on the planet Rishi that served as the main base of the pirates known as the Ravagers. The town was known as Ruugaria when the Ravagers were under the leadership of Ruugar, but his lieutenant Coratanni betrayed and ousted him, taking the Ravagers for her own. Toe-Chop's Tapcaf was located in the town, and the Ravagers' ships, such as the Soaring Duros and the Pearl's Girl, frequently docked at the town.

Coratanni Town appears as one of the locations in the Operation "The Ravagers," which was added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic in the 2014 Digital Expansion Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan.
